item.title: Performance Engineer (SOMA)
item.description:
ON24 is committed to one area of expertise: providing industry-recognized webcasting solutions that are designed to meet performance, value, and reliability requirements for businesses of all types and sizes. Founded in 1998, ON24 offers a portfolio of webcasting products for internal and external communications, available as either licensed ASP products or turnkey outsourced solutions.

TITLE
Senior Performance Engineer


JOB SUMMARY
You will be expected to play a key role in ensuring that applications perform as designed and that while systems scale under increasing load. This role requires an analytical problem solving approach. You must be a good communicator with excellent presentation and documentation skills. You also need to be a good project manager, to be able to track performance issues and bottlenecks through their development, qa, and re-test phases prior to rollout.

Organizational Unit:
Engineering

JOB RESPONSIBILITIES
Developing and Maintaining benchmark test loads
Understanding and troubleshooting environment configurations
Executing Load, Stress, and Performance tests
Analyzing results, identifying bottlenecks, proposing solutions that may improve application performance or system capacity.
Project Managing optimization projects that result from the identified bottlenecks
Documenting and presenting your results.
Maintaining and extending a Java-based in-house load-generation tool as needed

ESSENTIAL EXPERIENCE
4 year degree and 5+ years of technical experience with at least 3+ years performance engineering.
Comfortable interacting with all levels of management and technical resources.
Excellent verbal and written communication, well organized, and good presentation skills
Proven problem-solving capabilities and the ability to work independently.
Experience with Dynatrace, Wily Introsocope, or Borland Optimizit/Servertrace
Experience with testing and tuning applications run on BEA Weblogic.
Experience with testing and tuning Oracle databases
Intermediate Java (EE) programming ability
Intermediate UNIX/Shell Scripting abilities.

ESSENTIAL SKILLS
Experience as a Build Engineer, work with ANT, Build Management and Automation is extremely desirable
Experience with JVM tuning concepts
A good understanding of JPA, Weblogic Clustering

COMPENSATION
TBD


Please submit resumes to jobs@on24.com with Performance Engineer  in the subject line.
